sense.def:
Further
pomeni do višje stopnje ali obsega.

seg.quote: The situation was further complicated by uncertainty about the future.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
goes further
ali
takes something further
, napreduje ali ponese nekaj do višje stopnje ali podrobnejše ravni.

seg.quote: He hoped the new offer would develop matters a stage further.

sense.def:
Stvar ali količina, ki je
further
, je dodatna.

seg.quote: We need a further five hundred pounds.
Do you have nothing further to say?
Further to your enquiry of the 16th, I am happy to enclose the new contract.

sense.def:
Further
pomeni večjo razdaljo kot prej ali kot kaj drugega.

seg.quote: I walked further than I intended.

sense.def:
To further something
pomeni nečemu pomagati k napredku ali uspehu.

seg.quote: ...a plot by Morris to further his career.
